backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature update related to smooth fade‑in audio behavior and its associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing passcode unlock, modals, scrolling, and rendering all site sections with background music and decorations.
frontend/src/components/ambient/Romantic: Renders floating hearts, petals, and sparkles as fixed animated ambient background elements.
frontend/src/components/gallery/FlipImag: Flip‑card image component supporting local image replacement with IndexedDB persistence and displaying a message on the back.
frontend/src/components/gate/PasscodeGat: Numeric keypad passcode lock enforcing a 12‑digit code with error shake animation and clear/delete controls.
frontend/src/components/media/Background: Custom audio player with play/mute controls and smooth fade‑in on autoplay, user play, and manual loop restarts.
frontend/src/components/modals/EntryModa: A dialog modal prompting entry with themed styling and a button triggering onEnter.
frontend/src/components/modals/LoveLette: Scrollable dialog presenting a long romantic letter with decorative emojis.
frontend/src/components/modals/RomanticM: A birthday‑themed modal showing a short message with animated floating emojis.
frontend/src/components/ornaments/Blinki: Animated fixed header showing a sequence of blinking emojis that cycle every second.
frontend/src/content/mediaPlaceholders.t: Configuration listing placeholder image and video paths for galleries.
frontend/src/content/romanticMessages.ts: Array of short romantic messages used for card backs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalMedia.ts: Hook for loading, saving, and previewing locally overridden image or video media via IndexedDB.
frontend/src/hooks/useObjectPositionDrag: Provides a pointer‑drag hook that updates an object's x/y position within a container using percentage coordinates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a placeholder hook returning no queries since all data is client‑side.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom romantic color variables and various animation keyframes.
frontend/src/lib/localMediaStore.ts: Implements an IndexedDB‑backed store for saving, retrieving, and removing media blobs keyed by ID.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Renders a romantic hero section with titles, affectionate names list, and a button to open a birthday message.
frontend/src/sections/ImageMemorySection: Displays a grid of flip image cards using gallery data, each revealing a romantic message.
frontend/src/sections/SurpriseSection.ts: Shows a surprise love‑letter section with a modal trigger and an affectionate closing message.
frontend/src/sections/VideoMemorySection: Renders a video gallery with optional edit mode allowing users to replace videos via local media storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended color palette using CSS vars, custom shadows, fonts, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a romantic mobile-first website, its features, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for ongoing development.
